title: Customized E-Learning Science Exploration for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Science curriculum reflecting learners' personal life experiences and interests. Utilizes tablets/smartphones in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Learners can explain scientific principles in everyday life using personalized science content generated from individual profiling
Through three or more self-directed learning plans, learners can conduct in-depth exploration of science topics in their areas of interest
Learners can produce individual learning outcomes and present them to peers through project-based assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
